Vision

The ECHPunks team is made up of Echelon Community members who came together with the vision to create a project that is trustworthy and full of features including collectable NFT's, decentralized games, a tradable token and more.

Collectable NFT's

Each ECHPunk NFT will have a unique character inspired by the original Crypto Punk Project. In order to play games within our ecosystem, you must own an ECHPunk NFT.

ECHP Token

ECHP tokens are required to mint new ECHPunk NFT's. Tokens used to mint new ECHPunk NFT's will automatically be burnt. Burning these tokens will reduce the total supply of the token further increasing the tokens value.

ECHPunk Tokenomics

Total Supply:

100,000,000,000 ECHP

Tax/Trade:

5% tax (burn)

Max Transaction: 500,000,000 (.5%)

Max Wallet: 2,000,000,000 (2%)
